title: ST-1205 Default Eval Set
description: Evaluate Fresh weighting and conditional Self‑RAG using a small, stable query set. Results are written to status/evidence/memory/set_eval/<UTC_YYYYMMDD>/set_eval_<day>.json.
notes: Fresh weighting (need_fresh=1, halflife_days≈7, fresh_weight≈0.9) showed consistent top-3 average lift (~+0.17 to +0.23) across queries.
Self‑RAG v0 with conditional application and rubric/bonus/cap/0.92:0.08 blend is stabilized (near-zero average impact) to avoid harming baseline.
Recall run evidence is written per ON search under status/evidence/memory/recall_runs/<day>/run_*.json (pre_items vs post_items).
Set eval summary consolidates OFF vs ON (pre/post) top‑3 averages for each query.
